::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod sat outside the Cybertronian Fire, when he got the message from
Prowler. He opened his commlink.
"Hey, what are you doing here, Prowler?"

::DrillBit::

DrillBit still kept an eye on KitKat.

::K9::

K9 continued to sleep in the room.
